mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ZIPCODE = #{MEMBER_ZIPCODE}, MEMBER_ADDRESS1 = #{MEMBER_ADDRESS1}, MEMBER_ADDRESS2 = #{MEMBER_ADDRESS2}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{MEMBER_PHONE}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, MEMBER_NAME = #{MEMBER_NAME} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
mapper.select: select CANCEL_NUMBER,ORDER_NUMBER,TO_CHAR(CANCEL_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CANCEL_REGDATE ,CANCEL_TITLE,CANCEL_CONTENT,CANCEL_CATEGORY from cancel where order_number in (select order_number from orderlist where member_id=#{MEMBER_ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE CANCEL SET CANCEL_TITLE= #{CANCEL_TITLE}, CANCEL_CONTENT= #{CANCEL_CONTENT}, CANCEL_CATEGORY= #{CANCEL_CATEGORY}, CANCEL_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE CANCEL_NUMBER=#{CANCEL_NUMBER}
